titles.title: A resolution recognizing the efforts of the National Park Service and others in restoring and repairing the Washington Monument.
A resolution recognizing the efforts of the National Park Service and others in restoring and repairing the Washington Monument.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Pays tribute to the National Park Service (NPS), NPS contractors, and all individuals who contributed to the restoration of the Washington Monument.
Calls on the people of the United States to recognize the hard work of the NPS in preserving the monuments of the United States.
